code: dir_roxy(path, markdown = TRUE, quiet = FALSE, ...)  file_roxy(path, markdown = TRUE, quiet = FALSE, ...)  obj_roxy(obj, title = NULL, description = NULL, markdown = TRUE, ...)

title:
Helper functions using {sinew} to make roxygen2 skeletons for directories,
files, and objects — create_roxy
text: path File directory path. markdown boolean return roxygen2 skeleton Markdown formatting, Default: FALSE quiet FALSE (default), open code files generated sinew::makeOxyFile() print code generated sinew::makeOxygen(). ... Arguments passed makeOxygen add_default boolean add defaults values end PARAM fields, Default: TRUE add_fields character vector add additional roxygen2 fields, Default: c("details","examples","seealso","rdname","export") use_dictionary character, path_to_dictionary, Default: NULL use_labels boolean use label attribute data frame columns fill column description values. Ignored obj function vector. Default: FALSE. scope scope transformations: "simple" runs transformations substantially change resulting .Rd files, "full" runs transformations. larger packages, run "none", double-check track changes, run "simple" "full". obj function name function, data frame, vector (strings interpreted function names). title, description Optional title description values use

what: Create a temporary R package from a script or folder — create_temp_package

text: pkg provided, package name based basename project working directory. default, package created temporary directory deleted session restarts.

title: Create a temporary R package from a script or folder — create_temp_package
code: create_temp_package(   path,   pkg = NULL,   fields = list(),   rstudio = FALSE,   check_name = TRUE,   open = FALSE,   tmp_dir = tempdir(),   overwrite = FALSE,   call = caller_env() )

title: Create a temporary R package from a script or folder — create_temp_package
text: path character vector one paths. pkg Package name. Optional. fields named list fields add DESCRIPTION, potentially overriding default values. See use_description() can set personalized defaults using package options. rstudio TRUE, calls use_rstudio() make new package project RStudio Project. FALSE non-package project, sentinel .file placed directory can recognized project rprojroot packages. check_name Whether check name valid CRAN throw error . open TRUE, activates new project: using RStudio desktop, package opened new session. RStudio server, current RStudio project activated. Otherwise, working directory active project changed. tmp_dir Directory temporary package created. Defaults tempdir(). overwrite Default FALSE. TRUE, overwrite NAMESPACE file R scripts location sharing names. call execution environment currently running function, e.g. caller_env(). function mentioned error messages source error. See call argument abort() information.

title: Create a temporary R package from a script or folder — create_temp_package

what: Create a temporary package and use roxygenise() to create and load documentation — path_document
title: Create a temporary package and use roxygenise() to create and load documentation — path_document
text: Inspired document::document(), package combines calls usethis::create_package() roxygen2::roxygenise() create temporary package based R script directory R scripts using roxygen documentation. scripts loaded documentation accessible within RStudio using ?.

title: Create a temporary package and use roxygenise() to create and load documentation — path_document
code: path_document(   path,   pkg = NULL,   fields = list(),   tmp_dir = tempdir(),   markdown = TRUE,   overwrite = FALSE,   roclets = NULL,   load_code = NULL,   clean = FALSE,   quiet = FALSE,   allow_file = TRUE,   regexp = "\\.[rR]$" )  path_roxygenise(   path,   pkg = NULL,   fields = list(),   tmp_dir = tempdir(),   markdown = TRUE,   overwrite = FALSE,   roclets = NULL,   load_code = NULL,   clean = FALSE,   quiet = FALSE,   allow_file = TRUE,   regexp = "\\.[rR]$" )

title: Create a temporary package and use roxygenise() to create and load documentation — path_document
text: path character vector one paths. pkg Package name. Optional. fields named list fields add DESCRIPTION, potentially overriding default values. See use_description() can set personalized defaults using package options. tmp_dir Directory temporary package created. Defaults tempdir(). markdown TRUE (default), use usethis::use_roxygen_md() ensure Markdown formatted roxygen comments converted. overwrite Default FALSE. TRUE, overwrite NAMESPACE file R scripts location sharing names. roclets Character vector roclet names use package. default, NULL, uses roxygen roclets option, defaults c("collate", "namespace", "rd"). load_code function used load R code package directory. default, NULL, uses strategy defined load roxygen option, defaults load_pkgload(). See load details. clean TRUE, roxygen delete files previously created roxygen running roclet. quiet TRUE, suppress messages usethis cli calls. function always suppresses package startup messages package loaded roxygen2::roxygenise(). allow_file TRUE, path_document() allows file directory input paths. FALSE, function errors file path inputs. regexp regular expression (e.g. [.]csv$) passed grep() filter paths.

See call argument abort() information.
